query.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:INPUT_TYPE_CODES:X.CODE:CODE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:INPUT_TYPE_CODES:X.LAST_UPDATED_DATE:LAST_UPDATED_DATE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:INPUT_TYPE_CODES:X.LAST_UPDATED_BY:LAST_UPDATED_BY@ FROM ( SELECT tc.code AS code, tc.last_updated_date AS last_updated_date, tc.last_updated_by AS last_updated_by FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT 'all_input_type_codes' AS code, tc.prmodtime AS last_updated_date, CASE WHEN tc.prmodby = 'admin' THEN 1 ELSE CAST(tc.prmodby AS INT) END AS last_updated_by FROM prtypecode tc ) tc LEFT JOIN cmn_sec_users csu ON csu.id = tc.last_updated_by ) x WHERE @FILTER@
